title: About re evaluation of esa exam
content: After esa we can apply for re evaluation  right,like whts the price for it . Wht if I am at the border line to pass wht should I do

comments.body: Adding more context: it's ₹250 per credit. So the cost depends on the number of credits for that course.
I heard that it’s 100 to see paper if I see paper then can I apply for reval or I should pay altogether only
Yessir this is PES everything has a price. Even paper viewing costs 100 per paper
Yessir this is PES everything has a price. Even paper viewing costs 100 per paper
Yup you can view first. That's what everyone does.
Nope its 1000 for all of them now apparently a junior paid 3k for dbms,se and big data and as far as I remember dbms is a 5 cred course
I don't think it's like that now, 4 and 5 credits all need 1000rs only for reval
Hmm that's interesting. Thanks for the update.
Do we have to go and select the questions for re-eval like ISA or will they re-eval the entire paper??
